subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Raymond Felton aggravated his right pinkie and left the game late in the third quarter. But he returned in the fourth to score 5 of his 14 points in a victory at Madison Square Garden.
snippet: Raymond Felton aggravated his right pinkie and left the game late in the third quarter. But he returned in the fourth to score 5 of his 14 points in a victory at Madison Square Garden.
